property.name: shiftDistance
property.shortdesc: The distance to translate the (unscaled) prototype before filling.

property.name: shiftAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle to translate the (unscaled) prototype before filling.

property.name: scaleFactor
property.shortdesc: The fraction to scale the prototype before filling.

property.name: rotation
property.shortdesc: The angle to rotate the before filling.

property.name: reflect
property.shortdesc: Whether or not the prototype is reflected before filling.

property.name: reflectAngle
property.shortdesc: The axis around which to reflect.

property.name: shearAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle to slant the shear by.

property.name: shearAxis
property.shortdesc: The axis to shear with respect to.

property.name: matrix
property.shortdesc: Additional transformation arising from manipulating the path.
